column4: i would like to use XDVDShrink but i don't know how to install it can anyone give me a hand, please?

frogging101 i guess that makes both of us
i would like to use and install XDVDShrink but i don't know how to install it cuz i'm new with us'n ubuntu
that's my ?
i have tried that and XDVDShrink isn't in there
it's like dvdshrink aka window's but i do know that XDVDShrink is the linux version of it
go to the xdvdshrink website, download the .tar.gz file and save it to your home directory. Open up a terminal and type: tar -xvzf xdvdshrink* <enter> cd dvdshrink <enter> ./install <enter>
odd-rationale: how does XDVDShrink do the same thing as k9copy?
thnkx i'll give that a shot
sorry, replace ./install with     sudo ./install.sh
